text: Neil Quentin Gordon Parish (born 26 May 1956) is a British farmer and former Conservative politician. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Tiverton and Honiton from 2010 to 2022. He was a member of the European Parliament for South West England from 1999 to 2009. In April 2022, Parish had the Conservative party whip suspended and eventually resigned as MP after admitting to watching pornography during a commons meeting. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:MEPs for the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Somerset
title: Neil Parish
